title: Ep173 Murderous Family Trees
description: This week, the gals examine some family trees with rotten roots. Topics include mothering red flags, a supes-suspish dining room curtain, and a pair of traveling brothers who left a trail of violence. Pop open a fresh bottle of Capuchon Carignane, order a genealogy test ASAP, and tune in for Murderous Family Trees. For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support

This week, the gals examine some family trees with rotten roots.
